value.info_text:
When one of your spells goes critical, you bind glyphs in radius 1 centered on a random target in range 10 at the cost of 5 positive and 5 negative energy.

Glyphs last for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns and cause various effects when an enemy enters their grid.

Glyphs will only spawn on enemies that aren't adjacent to an existing glyph.

This can only happen every 4 game turns.

Glyph effects will scale with your Spellpower.

Available glyphs are:

Glyph of Sunlight: Bind sunlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a brilliant light, dealing 0.00 light damage and healing you for 65, 89, 107, 122, 136.

Glyph of Moonlight: Bind moonlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a fatiguing darkness, dealing 0.00 darkness damage and reducing the foes damage dealt by 52%, 70%, 84%, 97%, 100% for 2 turns.

Glyph of Twilight: Bind twilight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a burst of twilight, dealing 0.00 light and 0.00 darkness damage and knocking the foe back 1 tiles.
value.name: Glyphs

Also, when you end a Hymn, you will gain a buff of a type based on which Hymn you ended.

Hymn of Shadows increases your movement speed by 423%, 573%, 690%, 789%, 876% for one turn.

Hymn of Detection makes you invisible (power 19, 26, 31, 36, 39) for 5, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns.

Hymn of Perseverance grants a damage shield (power 350, 474, 571, 652, 725) for 5, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns.

The light of your Radiance allows you to see that which would normally be unseen and strike that which would normally be protected.

All enemies in your Radiance aura have their invisibility and stealth power reduced by 81;, 105;, 123;, 138;, 152; all actors affected by illumination have their defense reduced by 27, 34, 40, 46, 50 as well as all evasion bonuses from being unseen negated.

In addition, your light damage is increased by 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11% and your strikes ignore 17%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 49% of the light resistance of your targets.

The invisibility, stealth power, and defense reductions increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
Your actions foreshadow a bleak outcome for your foes.

Each time you deal darkness, fire, blight or acid damage you curse your foe with an effect that stacks up to 4, 6, 8, 10, 11 times (this can happen only once per creature per turn).

The vim you get for killing the creature is increased by 100% for every stack of Bleak Outcome.

The vim's worth of a creature depends on your Willpower.
value.name: Bleak Outcome

value2.info_text:

The future looks grim indeed… for your foes.

You can target a creature affected by Bleak Outcome to consume up to 4, 6, 8, 10, 11 stacks, dealing 14, 18, 22, 25, 28 darkness damage to it for every stack and increasing your Spellpower by 4 per stacks for 6 turns.

While powered-up you can not apply new Bleak Outcome stacks.

Damage is based on your Spellpower.

This effect will only trigger every 25, 20, 18, 16, 14 turns (after a successful daze has been applied).

While transformed you are invisible (power 45, 61, 73, 84, 93), convert 100% of all damage done to darkness and gain darkness resistance penetration and damage increase equal to your highest.

While transformed you can not apply new Bleak Outcome stacks.

When you de-activate the talent you can use the charges to either:

  • restore 3.79, 6.47, 8.52, 10, 12 vim per charge
  • deal 31, 42, 50, 58, 64 blight damage per charge to a target in range 5.
  • create a shield absorbing 38, 52, 63, 72, 80 per chage damage and refelcting half of it back to attackers.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.

Each time you walk or move you gain a blight charge. You can store up to 6, 8, 10, 14, 16 charges.

While stealthed you wrap shadows around you in a defensive cloak, giving you a 9%, 18%, 23%, 27%, 29% chance to ignore physical or magical detrimental effects.

Your equiped lite does not count and will be turned off when activating.

Moving will cancel the effect.

Each time your kill a creature with non-fire damage you gain a blackice charge for 20 turns (stacking to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6).

At any moment you can use a charge to infect a creature with blackice, reducing its fire and physical resistance by 45%, 57%, 67%, 75%, 82% for 7 turns.
value.name: Blackice

At any moment you can use a charge to infect a creature with blackice, reducing its fire resistance by 45%, 57%, 67%, 75%, 82% for 7 turns.
value2.name: Blackice

value.info_text:
Raging flames burn foes and allies alike, doing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 fire damage in a radius of 5 each turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Demons standing in the doomfire will instead be healed.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Doomfire

value.info_text:
Whenever you take blight damage you bask in the sweet pain for 2 turns, increasing all damage affinity by 15%.

This can only happen every 15, 10, 8, 6, 5 turns.
value.name: Pain Affinity

value.info_text:
Whenever you block an attack with your shield, you randomly hex the attacker with one of the hexes: Pacification, Domination, Burning or Empathic as if cast at talent level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

This may only happen once per turn.
value.name: Hexed Shield

value.info_text:
Whenever make a melee attack, you have a 9%, 18%, 23%, 27%, 29% chance to randomly curse the target with one of the curses: Defenselessness, Impotence, Death or Vulnerability as if cast at talent level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

This may only happen once per turn.
value.name: Cursed Arm

value.info_text:
A furious fire storm rages around the caster, doing 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 fire damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 11, 12, 13, 13, 14 turns.

You closely control the firestorm, preventing it from harming your party members.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Doom Storm

value.info_text:
Fire a blast of frostfire in radius 6, doing 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 fire damage and freezing creatures in ice blocks for 4 turns.

For each frozen creature you regenerate 9 vim.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Frostfire Nova

value.info_text:
You breathe a mix of darkness and flight in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 271, 367, 441, 504, 560 darkness/blight damage.

In addition each time you do a melee attack there is a 10% chance to trigger the breath at no cost.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fetid Breath

value.info_text:
Deal a blight-enhanced melee blow, dealing 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% blight damage.

If the attack hits and the creature dies in the next 2 turns you drink its essence which makes you regenerate 7 vim per turn and gain 40% chance to evade attacks for the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.
value.name: Blood Drinker

value.info_text:
Using demonic forces you jump high in the sky and fall down on your target as a meteor, slamming the ground with your shield.

The impact is so powerful it shakes the ground in radius 2, dealing a 185%, 200%, 211%, 221%, 229% fire and physical shield attack to all foes and turning the ground into lava.
value.name: Meteor Slam

value.info_text:
By seathing yourself in flames you phase to a distant location.

Any creature caught in the way is burnt for 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 fire damage which you use to regain 12 vim.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Blazing Phase

value.info_text:
Grab a target and pull it next to you, covering it with frost while reducing its movement speed by 50% for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The ice will also deal 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 cold damage.

The damage and chance to slow will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Frost Grab

value.info_text:
Whenever you take direct damage, there is a 19%, 42%, 55%, 63%, 70% chance that your your diseased body erupts in blight, diseasing your attacker with a random disease for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns.

Each turn the disease deals 24, 30, 36, 40, 44 blight damage and reduce one random attribute (strength, dexterity, constitution) by 17, 23, 28, 32, 36.

This may only happen once per turn.

The damage increases with your spellpower.
value.name: Diseased Body

value.info_text:
For every turn where you take damage you have a 19%, 42%, 55%, 63%, 70% chance to store a seismic charge.

You can activate this spell to consume the charges, spawning a raging volcano that lasts for 2 turns per charges.

Each turn the volcano spews 2 flaming boulders that deal 26, 35, 42, 49, 54 fire and 26, 35, 42, 49, 54 physical damage.

The charges quickly fade when outside of combat.

The damage increases with your spellpower.
value.name: Volcanic Skin

value.info_text:
Strike a blow with your weapon for 110%, 132%, 148%, 161%, 174% blight damage.

If the attack hits a demonic seed tries to take hold inside your foe and you follow up with a shield strike dealing 100%, 117%, 130%, 141%, 151% damage and dazing your target for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The seed requires a powerful host to nourish it and can only take hold in creatures that are worth experience and that are not summoned demons.

The chance for the seed to take hold is based on the creatures rank:

Normal: 5%

Elite: 20%

Rare or Unique: 50%

Boss: 100%

When the host dies the seed fills with the vim of the dying creature and turns into a specific demon seed that can be used to summon that demon.

If you already have a seed of the same time in your inventory or equipment it will instead increase its level if the host was of higher level than the seed and the demon inside will regenerate 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% health and resurrect if it was dead.

Higher talent levels allow for more powerful demon types.

Implanting a seed into unique demons, if successful, will always try to grant a seed of that type, if available.
value.name: Demon Seed

value2.info_text:
Strike a blow with your weapon for 110%, 132%, 148%, 161%, 174% blight damage.

If the attack hits a demonic seed tries to take hold inside your foe and you follow up with a shield strike dealing 100%, 117%, 130%, 141%, 151% damage and dazing your target for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The seed requires a powerful host to nourish it and can only take hold in creatures that are worth experience and that are not summoned demons.

The chance for the seed to take hold is based on the creatures rank:

Normal: 5%

Elite: 20%

Rare or Unique: 50%

Boss: 100%

When the host dies the seed fills with the vim of the dying creature and turns into a specific demon seed that can be used to summon that demon

A demonic seed will only be created if you do not already have a seed of this demon/slot of a superior level.

Higher talent levels allow for more powerful demon types.
value2.name: Demon Seed

value.info_text:
Your knowledge of demonic forces grows, allowing you to bind more seeds to you and to summon demons.

You channel your arcane corruption through a demon seed to temporarily summon the corresponding demon for 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns.

Summoned demons can regen their life and resummoning them keeps the life they had when they were last used.

If the demon dies it will not be available for summoning anymore until resurrected.

This spell can summon demons from any seeds available in either your equipment or inventory.

As you learn to bind more easily you can also use more seeds:

At level 2 it lets you bind a seed to your first ring.

At level 3 it lets you bind a seed to your shield.

At level 4 it lets you bind a seed to your second ring.

At level 5 it lets you bind a seed to your main body armour.
value.name: Bind Demon

value2.info_text:
Your knowledge of demonic forces grows, allowing you to bind more seeds to you and to summon demons.

You channel your arcane corruption through a demon seed to temporarily summon the corresponding demon for 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns.

Summoned demons can regen their life and resummoning them keeps the life they had when they were last used.

If the demon dies it will not be available for summoning anymore.

As you learn to bind more easily you can also use more seeds:

At level 2 it lets you bind a seed to your first ring.

At level 3 it lets you bind a seed to your shield.

At level 4 it lets you bind a seed to your second ring.

At level 5 it lets you bind a seed to your main body armour.
value2.name: Bind Demon

value.info_text:
You drain the life of your foes to replinish yours and those of your demon seeds.

Each time you kill a creature a random worn demon seed with less than 100% life will be healed for 2%, 5%, 8%, 10%, 12% life.

If the creature is an elite or more you also have 100% chance to resurrect a dead demon seed.

At level 5 you also start to leech energies to heal yourself, all damage you do heals you for 3%, 5%, 6%, 8%, 9%.

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will fizzle.

This spell requires an unsummoned, alive, demon seed equiped in a worn equipment to work.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.

Enters stealth mode (power 42, 53, 60, 65, 70, based on Cunning), making you harder to detect.

If successful (re-checked each turn), enemies will not know exactly where you are, or may not notice you at all.

Stealth reduces your light radius to 0, increases your infravision by 3, and will not work with heavy or massive armours.

You cannot enter stealth if there are foes in sight within range 9, 7, 6, 5, 5.

Any non-instant, non-movement action will break stealth if not otherwise specified.

Enemies uncertain of your location will still make educated guesses at it.

While stealthed, enemies cannot share information about your location with each other and will be delayed in telling their allies that you exist at all.

value.name: Trick Shot

value2.info_text:
Your cunning and dexterity allow you to fire incredible trick shots that can hit multiple targets.

You precisely aim your trick shot to ricochet amongst foes you can see so that whenever it hits something solid (creature or solid wall), it will bounce towards the next closest foe.

It may ricochet up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 times (or until it misses) within range 5 of your first target and will not target the same foe twice.

Your shot deals 100%, 117%, 130%, 141%, 151% weapon damage on its first strike, but loses 40%, 28%, 22%, 18%, 15% damage and 0(50%, 36%, 29%, 23%, 19%) accuracy with each bounce.
value2.name: Trick Shot

value.info_text: You equip your mecharachnid with a stormcoil generator, a mechanical device that projects a powerful electrical field. On taking a hit greater than 15% of its maximum life, the excess damage will be reduced by 14%, 38%, 50%, 59%, 65% and converted into energy, giving your mecharachnid 9%, 18%, 23%, 27%, 29% increased global speed for 2 turns.
value.name: Stormcoil Generator

value2.info_text: You equip your mecharachnid with a stormcoil generator, a mechanical device that projects a powerful electrical field. value.info_text: Leap into your mecharachnid, assuming direct control of it for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. While piloting it, all damage dealt is increased by 10%, 26%, 36%, 44%, 50%, resistances are increased by 10%, 22%, 30%, 35%, 40%, and all of its talents cooldown twice as fast.

value.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 115%, 130%, 141%, 151%, 159% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also if the target is protected by any temporary magical or psionic damage absorbing shields there is 9%, 50%, 68%, 78%, 84% chance to shatter a random shield.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.

Allows counterstrikes after incomplete blocks.

Increases the number of counterstrikes you can perform on a target while they're vulnerable by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

Increases the crit chance of counterstrikes by 25%, 27%, 30%, 33%, 35%. This increase scales with your Dexterity.

value.info_text:
Equip a bandolier holding up to 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 throwing knives, allowing you to attack from range. You automatically reload 2 knives per turn while resting, or half as many while moving.

The base power, Armour penetration, and critical strike chance of your knives increase with talent level, accuracy increase with your accuracy, and damage is improved with Dagger Mastery.

Throwing Knives count as melee attacks for the purpose of on-hit effects.

Effective Throwing Knife Stats:

Range: 4, 5, 6, 6, 7

Net Damage: 4, 11, 23, 34, 45 - 6, 16, 33, 48, 63

Accuracy: 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 (knife)

APR: 0

Crit Chance: +0%, +0%, +12%, +27%, +42%

Crit mult: 150%

Uses Stats: 70% Dex, 50% Str

value.info_text: Any time you do not have an opponent in a square adjacent to you, you gain 1.9, 3.5, 4.9, 6.2, 7.4 Stamina regeneration. At talent level 3 or more, you also gain an equal amount of life regen when Breathing Room is active.
value.name: Breathing Room

value2.info_text: Any time you do not have an opponent in a square adjacent to you, you gain 1.9, 3.5, 4.9, 6.2, 7.4 Stamina regeneration. With the third talent point, you also gain an equal amount of life regen when Breathing Room is active.

value.info_text:
Control your movements to increase your defenses. This allows you to shrug off minor damage and, if you have a shield equipped, preemptively Block in reaction to incoming damage.

While this talent is activated, you are globally slowed by 15%, 10%, 7.8%, 6.2%, 5.0% and all damage you take is reduced by a flat 11, 15, 18, 20, 23.

If you have a shield equipped and Block is not on cooldown, any blockable damage that is greater than 33% of your block value (before resistances) will have a 20%, 27%, 32%, 36%, 40% chance to instantly activate Block.

The flat damage reduction will increase with your defense.
value.name: Pace Yourself

value2.info_text:
Control your movements to increase your defenses. This allows you to shrug off minor damage and, if you have a shield equipped, preemptively Block in reaction to incoming damage.

While this talent is activated, you are globally slowed by 15%, 10%, 7.8%, 6.2%, 5.0% and all damage you take is reduced by a flat 11, 16, 19, 22, 25.

If you have a shield equipped and Block is not on cooldown, any blockable damage that is greater than 25% of your block value (before resistances) will have a 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 55% chance to instantly activate Block.

The flat damage reduction will increase with your defense.
value2.name: Pace Yourself

value.info_text:
During your studies of celestial forces you came in contact with an entity far beyond Eyal: the living incarnation of a Star!

By allying yourself with it you can gain its power!

Grants multiple benefits:

  • The strength of your bond is so strong that you can now wield a two-handed weapon and a shield together
  • 50% of all damage you deal is converted to light damage
  • Gravitic Effulgence: whenever your Weapon of Light hits the damage is now a radius 2 sphere and all foes in range 5 are drawn to it. (You can toggle this effect)
  • The damage and chance to trigger of Searing Sight is doubled
  • Whenever Sun's Vengeance triggers the remaining cooldown of Judgement is reduced by 6.
  • If you also know Irresistible Sun, it will set the fire and light resistances of those affected to 0%

Will you bind yourself to the Distant Sun?
value.name: #LIGHT_STEEL_BLUE#Avatar of a Distant Sun (Class Evolution)
require: Level 25, Mag 25, Str 50; Unlocked the evolution, Talent Sun's Vengeance, Talent Weapon of Light, Talent Searing Sight, Talent Judgement

value.info_text:
Your mere presence is terrying to any foes that dare stand against you.

Every turn all foes in radius 4, 7, 8, 10, 10 must make a mental save against your spellpower/physical power (whichever is highest) or become frightened (bypassing fear immunity), reducing all their saves by 14, 25, 34, 42, 48, all damage by 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%, 29% and movement speed by 10%, 19%, 24%, 28%, 30%.

If they successfully resist, they are immune for 18, 14, 12, 10, 9 turns.
value.name: Frightening Presence

value2.info_text:
Your mere presence is terrying to any foes that dare stand against you.

Every turn all foes in radius 4, 7, 8, 10, 10 must make a metal save against your spellpower/physical power (whichever is highest) or become frightened (bypassing fear immunity), reducing all their saves by 14, 25, 34, 42, 48, all damage by 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%, 29% and movement speed by 10%, 19%, 24%, 28%, 30%.

If they successfully resist, they are immune for 18, 14, 12, 10, 9 turns.
value2.name: Frightening Presence

value.info_text:
Summon a tornado that moves very slowly towards the target, following it if it changes position.

Each time it moves every foes within radius 2 takes 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 lightning damage and is knocked back 2 spaces.

When it reaches the target it explodes in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 4, 4, knocking back targets and dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 lightning and 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 physical damage.

The tornado will move a maximum of 20 times.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value.name: Tornado

value.info_text:
Destroys one of your summons, making it detonate in radius of 4, 5, 7, 8, 9.

  • Ritch Flamespitter: Explodes into a fireball dealing 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 damage, flameshocking damaged foes
  • Hydra: Grants 14%, 26%, 33%, 37%, 40% lightning, acid, and nature affinity as well as 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 life regen per turn to all friendly creatures for 7 turns
  • Rimebark: Explodes into an iceball dealing 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 ice damage, possibly freezing damaged foes
  • Fire Drake: Explodes into a cloud of lingering fire, dealing 79, 107, 129, 148, 164 damage per turn
  • War Hound: Explodes into a sharp ball, cutting all creatures for 58, 79, 95, 109, 121 bleeding damage per turn for 6 turns
  • Jelly: Explodes into a ball of slowing slime, dealing 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 nature damage and slowing foes by 25%, 36%, 41%, 45%, 48%
  • Minotaur: Confuses foes at 20%, 26%, 30%, 32%, 35% power for 5 turns
  • Stone Golem: Grants 17, 23, 29, 33, 37 armour and 25%, 35%, 45%, 55%, 65% armour hardiness to all friendly creatures for 5 turns
  • Turtle: Grants a small shell shield to all friendly creatures, granting 22%, 29%, 35%, 41%, 45% all resist for 5 turns
  • Spider: Knocks back all foes 2, 3, 4, 6, 7 tiles

    • In addition, a random summon will come off cooldown.

    Hostile effects will not hit you or your other summons.

    The effects improve with your mindpower, and some can crit.
value.name: Detonate
